name: Skunkerrplunk!
description:
SPACE = MoveUp 

 R= Replay*

Keep Skunky and her balloon safe as they ride joyously along.

Still not enough hours in the day for what I'd like to do but have learned a ton... 

Have managed to hack together a replay option and how to stay on screen (kind of).

*Figuring out how to add UI is next on the list for future projects,,, Menus, buttons and scores, Oh my!

WK3-Unity Create with Code Summer 2020
